创建 /etc/systemd/system/docker.service.d/http-proxy.conf 配置文件

[Service]
Environment="HTTP_PROXY=http://192.168.100.141:7890"
Environment="HTTPS_PROXY=http://192.168.100.141:7890"

然后重新加载配置并重启服务:
systemctl daemon-reload
systemctl restart docker

然后检查加载的配置:
systemctl show docker --property Environment


[Service]
Environment="HTTP_PROXY=http://10.42.238.88:7890"
Environment="HTTPS_PROXY=http://10.42.238.88:7890"

然后重新加载配置并重启服务:
systemctl daemon-reload
systemctl restart docker

然后检查加载的配置:
systemctl show docker --property Environment

192.168.168.128



db:
  user: root
  password: “123456”
  host: 127.0.0.1
  port: 3306
  db: blogx
  debug: false
  source: mysql
db1:
  user: root
  password: “123456”
  host: 127.0.0.1
  port: 3306
  db: blogx
  debug: false
  source: mysql
